title: ConceptHarmony Launches Beta
author: Spinach
summary: We are proud to announce the launch of our new fictional device database.
content: Welcome to ConceptHarmony! This database is designed to showcase fictional tech concepts. The project is currently entirely under my management. Who I am? Im Spinach. My name may be weird, but I've been long around in the fictional tech community, aswell as the TechTok community itself too. I created something like this once and this is my second shot. Im an HTML-CSS-hobbyist who enjoys spending his free time on stuff like this. Hope you like this website. A ton of stuff is going to happen here in the future.
